languages.text: "Властью, данной мне Патентом, я упраздняю Адептус Арбитес. Члены этой организации объявляются вне закона и лишаются права судить моих подданных. Отныне и впредь в Просторе Коронус есть лишь один вершитель суда и закона — я, {name} фон Валанциус!"

"By my right as the bearer of the Warrant of Trade, I hereby disband the Adeptus Arbites. All members of this organisation are henceforth outlawed and stripped of the right to judge my subjects. From this day forward, the Koronus Expanse has but one executor of judgement and law: me, {name} von Valancius!"
languages.original_text: "Властью, данной мне Патентом, я упраздняю Адептус Арбитес. Члены этой организации объявляются вне закона и лишаются права судить моих подданных. Отныне и впредь в Просторе Коронус есть лишь один вершитель суда и закона — я, {name} фон Валанциус!"

traits.locale_text: "By the power vested in me by the Warrant of Trade, I hereby disband the Adeptus Arbites. All members of this organisation are hereby outlawed and stripped of the right to judge my subjects. From this day forth, the Koronus Expanse has but one executor of judgement and law — me, {name} von Valancius!"

"By the power vested in me by the Warrant of Trade, I hereby disband the Adeptus Arbites. All members of this organisation are hereby outlawed and stripped of the right to judge my subjects. From this day forth, the Koronus Expanse has but one executor of judgement and law — me, {name} von Valancius!"

"By the power vested in me by the Warrant of Trade, I hereby disband the Adeptus Arbites. All members of this organisation are henceforth outlawed and stripped of the right to judge my subjects. From this day forward, the Koronus Expanse has but one executor of judgement and law: me, {name} von Valancius!"

"By the power vested in me by the Warrant of Trade, I hereby disband the Adeptus Arbites. All members of this organisation are henceforth outlawed and stripped of the right to judge my subjects. From this day forward, the Koronus Expanse has but one executor of judgement and law: me, {name} von Valancius!"

"By my right as the bearer of the Warrant of Trade, I hereby disband the Adeptus Arbites. All members of this organisation are henceforth outlawed and stripped of the right to judge my subjects. From this day forward, the Koronus Expanse has but one executor of judgement and law: me, {name} von Valancius!"

"By my right as the bearer of the Warrant of Trade, I hereby disband the Adeptus Arbites. All members of this organisation are henceforth outlawed and stripped of the right to judge my subjects. From this day forward, the Koronus Expanse has but one executor of judgement and law: me, {name} von Valancius!"

"By my right as the bearer of the Warrant of Trade, I hereby disband the Adeptus Arbites. All members of this organisation are henceforth outlawed and stripped of the right to judge my subjects. From this day forward, the Koronus Expanse has but one executor of judgement and law: me, {name} von Valancius!"

languages.text: "Kraft der mir durch den Handelsbrief verliehenen Macht löse ich das Adeptus Arbites hiermit auf. Alle Mitglieder dieser Organisation gelten fortan als Gesetzlose und haben das Recht verwirkt, über meine Untertanen zu richten. Vom heutigen Tage an gibt es in der Koronus-Ausdehnung nur noch {mf|einen Vollstrecker|eine Vollstreckerin} von Recht und Gesetz: mich, {name} von Valancius!"
languages.original_text: "By my right as the bearer of the Warrant of Trade, I hereby disband the Adeptus Arbites. All members of this organisation are henceforth outlawed and stripped of the right to judge my subjects. From this day forward, the Koronus Expanse has but one executor of judgement and law: me, {name} von Valancius!"

traits.locale_text: "Kraft der mir durch den Handelsbrief verliehenen Macht löse ich das Adeptus Arbites hiermit auf. Alle Mitglieder dieser Organisation gelten fortan als Gesetzlose und haben das Recht verwirkt, über meine Untertanen zu richten. Vom heutigen Tage an gibt es in der Koronus-Ausdehnung nur noch {mf|einen Vollstrecker|eine Vollstreckerin} von Recht und Gesetz: mich, {name} von Valancius!"

"Kraft der mir durch den Handelsbrief verliehenen Macht löse ich das Adeptus Arbites hiermit auf. Alle Mitglieder dieser Organisation gelten fortan als Gesetzlose und haben das Recht verwirkt, über meine Untertanen zu richten. Vom heutigen Tage an gibt es in der Koronus-Ausdehnung nur noch {mf|einen Vollstrecker|eine Vollstreckerin} von Recht und Gesetz: mich, {name} von Valancius!"

languages.text: « Par les droits que me confère la lettre de marque, je dissous l'Adeptus Arbites. Tous les membres de cette organisation seront désormais considérés comme des hors-la-loi et privés du droit de juger mes sujets. À compter de cet instant, une seule personne pourra faire appliquer la loi dans les Étendues de Koronus : moi, {name} von Valancius ! »
languages.original_text: "By my right as the bearer of the Warrant of Trade, I hereby disband the Adeptus Arbites. All members of this organisation are henceforth outlawed and stripped of the right to judge my subjects. From this day forward, the Koronus Expanse has but one executor of judgement and law: me, {name} von Valancius!"

traits.locale_text: « Par les droits que me confère la lettre de marque, je dissous l'Adeptus Arbites. Tous les membres de cette organisation seront désormais considérés comme des hors-la-loi et privés du droit de juger mes sujets. À compter de cet instant, une seule personne pourra faire appliquer la loi dans les Étendues de Koronus : moi, {name} von Valancius ! »

« Par les pouvoirs que me confère la lettre de marque, je dissous l'Adeptus Arbites. Tous les membres de cette organisation seront désormais considérés comme des hors-la-loi et privés du droit de juger mes sujets. À compter de cet instant, une seule personne pourra faire appliquer la loi dans les Étendues de Koronus : moi, {name} von Valancius ! »

languages.text: “我是神圣贸易授状的持有者，我下令在此解散法务部。法务部所有成员都视为违法分子，不再拥有审判王朝臣民的权力。从今天开始，整个科罗努斯扩区只有一个人有权进行审判、行刑。这个人就是我，{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯！”
languages.original_text: "By my right as the bearer of the Warrant of Trade, I hereby disband the Adeptus Arbites. All members of this organisation are henceforth outlawed and stripped of the right to judge my subjects. From this day forward, the Koronus Expanse has but one executor of judgement and law: me, {name} von Valancius!"

traits.locale_text: “我是神圣贸易授状的持有者，我下令在此解散法务部。法务部所有成员都视为违法分子，不再拥有审判王朝臣民的权力。从今天开始，整个科罗努斯扩区只有一个人有权进行审判、行刑。这个人就是我，{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯！”
“根据神圣贸易授状赋予我的权力，我在此解散法务部。法务部所有成员都视为违法分子，不再拥有审判王朝臣民的权力。从今天开始，整个科罗努斯扩区只有一个人有权进行审判、行刑。这个人就是我，{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯！”

languages.text: «Por el derecho que me otorga la Patente de Comercio, el Adeptus Arbites queda disuelto. Todos los miembros de esta organización quedan fuera de la ley, despojados del derecho a juzgar a mis súbditos. De ahora en adelante, en la Extensión de Koronus solo hay una persona que juzgue y ejecute la ley, ¡y soy yo, {name} von Valancius!».
languages.original_text: "By my right as the bearer of the Warrant of Trade, I hereby disband the Adeptus Arbites. All members of this organisation are henceforth outlawed and stripped of the right to judge my subjects. From this day forward, the Koronus Expanse has but one executor of judgement and law: me, {name} von Valancius!"

traits.locale_text: «Por el derecho que me otorga la Patente de Comercio, el Adeptus Arbites queda disuelto. Todos los miembros de esta organización quedan fuera de la ley, despojados del derecho a juzgar a mis súbditos. De ahora en adelante, en la Extensión de Koronus solo hay una persona que juzgue y ejecute la ley, ¡y soy yo, {name} von Valancius!».

«Por el poder que me concede la Patente de Comercio, el Adeptus Arbites queda disuelto. Todos los miembros de esta organización quedan fuera de la ley, despojados del derecho a juzgar a mis súbditos. De ahora en adelante, en la Extensión de Koronus solo hay una persona que juzgue y ejecute la ley, ¡y soy yo, {name} von Valancius!».

languages.text: 「通商令状により{mf|俺|私}に与えられた権限により、高等裁定局を解散する。今後、この組織の全メンバーは非合法となり、我が臣民を裁く権利を剥奪される。今日より、コロヌス・エクスパンスにおける裁きと法の執行者はただ一人、{mf|俺|私}、{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウスである！」
languages.original_text: "By my right as the bearer of the Warrant of Trade, I hereby disband the Adeptus Arbites. All members of this organisation are henceforth outlawed and stripped of the right to judge my subjects. From this day forward, the Koronus Expanse has but one executor of judgement and law: me, {name} von Valancius!"

traits.locale_text: 「通商令状により{mf|俺|私}に与えられた権限により、高等裁定局を解散する。今後、この組織の全メンバーは非合法となり、我が臣民を裁く権利を剥奪される。今日より、コロヌス・エクスパンスにおける裁きと法の執行者はただ一人、{mf|俺|私}、{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウスである！」
「通商令状により{mf|俺|私}に与えられた権限により、高等裁定局を解散する。今後、この組織の全メンバーは非合法となり、我が臣民を裁く権利を剥奪される。今日より、コロヌス・エクスパンスにおける裁きと法の執行者はただ一人、{mf|俺|私}、{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウスである！」

languages.text: "Ticari Ruhsatname'nin Hamili olarak Adeptus Arbites'i lağvediyorum. Bu teşkilatın tüm mensupları, bundan böyle kanun kaçağı ilan edilmiş olup tebaamı yargılama haklarından mahrum bırakılmıştır. Bugünden itibaren Koronus Enginliği'nde hüküm verme ve kanunu infaz etme yetkisi yalnızca tek bir kişiye aittir. Bana, {name} von Valancius'a!"
languages.original_text: "By my right as the bearer of the Warrant of Trade, I hereby disband the Adeptus Arbites. All members of this organisation are henceforth outlawed and stripped of the right to judge my subjects. From this day forward, the Koronus Expanse has but one executor of judgement and law: me, {name} von Valancius!"

traits.locale_text: "Ticari Ruhsatname'nin Hamili olarak Adeptus Arbites'i lağvediyorum. Bu teşkilatın tüm mensupları, bundan böyle kanun kaçağı ilan edilmiş olup tebaamı yargılama haklarından mahrum bırakılmıştır. Bugünden itibaren Koronus Enginliği'nde hüküm verme ve kanunu infaz etme yetkisi yalnızca tek bir kişiye aittir. Bana, {name} von Valancius'a!"

"Ticari Ruhsatname'nin bana verdiği yetkiye dayanarak Adeptus Arbites'i lağvediyorum. Bu teşkilatın tüm üyeleri bundan böyle kanun kaçağı ilan edilmiş ve tebaamı yargılama haklarından mahrum bırakılmıştır. Bugünden itibaren Koronus Enginliği'nin hüküm ve kanununu infaz etme yetkisi yalnızca tek bir kişiye aittir. Bana, {name} von Valancius'a!"
